page.title: 06FIVEWAYS CO-OP SUPERSTORE
page.content: The co-operative store at Fiveways,Stanway,was first opened in 1971 and was refitted as a {'superstore'}in 1985,measuring 42,000 square feet,the largest store in the area. It sells many different items including household items,groceries and clothes.The best selling foods are dog and cat food.It also has a garden centre,restaurant and petrol station. It has{revolutionary laser scanning checkouts.Three hundred are employed;a 16 yr.old earns 47 pounds a week. Unfortunately two pounds out of every 100 pounds are lost through theft of goods.T.V.cameras are used to survey the shop to detect shoplifters and other problems. The store is popular with shoppers from surrounding villages.The car park holds 550 cars
